name: ABYSS (itch) (MelinaRosales, NaalTreeWhisper96, eggy1225, Tasmi Islam, Isaac Adams, dfbb21345, KlepKat)
name_original: ABYSS (itch) (MelinaRosales, NaalTreeWhisper96, eggy1225, Tasmi Islam, Isaac Adams, dfbb21345, KlepKat)
description: An intrepid group of adventurers, creatures of all shapes and types, have fallen into a mysterious chasm during their search for the legendary treasure. With no other options, they delve deeper into the caverns but are confronted with monstrous creatures beyond their understanding. Take command, build your team, beat the monsters, and escape the abyss.
